alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued March 17 at 9:38PM EDT until March 19 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 8 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Expect the highest amounts on Tug Hill. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow as well. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 8 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4408 7515 4428 7556 4427 7587 4415 7638 4399 7638 4394 7603 4387 7580 4395 7569 4401 7544 4400 7517 TIME Y23M03D18T2100Z-Y23M03D19T0600Z COORD...4408 7515 4423 7545 4409 7559 4403 7592 4386 7634 4365 7623 4345 7639 4354 7577 4373 7547 4378 7512 TIME Y23M03D19T0600Z-Y23M03D19T1200Z COORD...4365 7515 4370 7565 4367 7598 4355 7625 4356 7643 4345 7663 4328 7661 4327 7586 4346 7581 4346 7543 TIME Y23M03D19T1200Z-Y23M03D20T0000Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
